94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (18:32): surkov: so, I was thinking about bug 686909 and that huristic is an ancient african word for "maybe if we take a  bong hit this problem will become more tractable"
47e87577fff6e08b0f2f43540db8c9c9 (18:32): Bug https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=686909 nor, --, ---, nobody, NEW, The system suffix is for system generated events only
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (18:33): and it occurs to me that if the text is changing in  a editable field that is focused the user almost certainly wants to know about the change
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (18:33): and the change is probably caused by the user since the thing changing is focused
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (18:34): why do you talk what we should have (it appears that's what bug summary states)
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (18:34): so, wow would you feel about a patch that sticks the system suffix on if and only if the thing having its text changed is not (editable and focused)
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (18:35): and a XXX comment saying "we should user isFromUserInput here but that isn't correct for text change events when content isn't being inserted"
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (18:35): sorry, typing is hard with laggy connection
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (18:35): well, at least that works in most cases
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (18:36): however I'm not sure we should say the event is from user input while the edit field is focused but the user doesn't change anything
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (18:37): true
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (18:37): I'm not saying its perfect, just a lot better
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (18:38): and that what orca arguably wants is sohould this be spoken
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (18:38): and I think there is an argument that even if the user didn't change something it should be spoken in this case
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (18:40): tbsaunde: that's should be not bad workaround
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (18:41): ok, I'll put a patch up in next day or two
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (18:41): just wanted to make sure I wasn't wasting my time writing a patch you'd r- out of hand
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (18:43): I'm not a monster :) thanks for working on it
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (18:45): hehe
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (18:45): but your dam good at find problems with patches :-)
